sys_script_include.description: populate user email which user is sent by client script
sys_script_include.name: FetchEmailId

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_dcf1502f933c4210528d36718bba10f4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1133380_hotel_0.FetchEmailId</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>populate user email which user is sent by client script </description><name>FetchEmailId</name><script><![CDATA[var FetchEmailId = Class.create();
FetchEmailId.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getEmailId:function(){
		var user = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		user.get(this.getParameter("sysparm_userId"));
		
		return user.email+ " ";
	},
    type: 'FetchEmailId'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-13 09:38:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>dcf1502f933c4210528d36718bba10f4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FetchEmailId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hotel Management" source="x_1133380_hotel_0">055c7abe93300210528d36718bba10f4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Hotel Management">055c7abe93300210528d36718bba10f4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dcf1502f933c4210528d36718bba10f4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-14 12:26:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
